name: FS Google Maps with Transparent objects
description: Combines 2 styles together, style 2447 (for full screen) and style 1929 (for removing the copyright). Besides combining the two styles, it also brings back the 3 different search toggles and makes the sidebar transparent (as well as removing the ads in the sidebar).
